jobsJson.descriptionPlain: We are looking for an experienced Market Research professional to join our growing GoFood Research team at Gojek. The Research team provides key insights to aid in the development and execution of overall business strategy, product design, marketing, and communication. This requires a combination of strong technical research capability complemented by strong business acumen and organizational prowess. The ideal candidate can balance both numeric and creative skills, is a strong communicator, and works well in a cross-functional, team-oriented structure. This role will sit within an embedded Research team for a specific Product vertical, reporting directly to the Research Lead for that product. The role is responsible for delivering key insights that will be used to inform overall business strategy, with key stakeholders including Business Strategists, Product Manager, Ops/Marketplace owners, and Marketing.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Execute strategic market research such as customer segmentation, market sizing, pricing studies, funnel analysis, and deep-dive category or brand analysis
  • Employ best practices for sample and survey design
  • Conduct market size estimation by leveraging internal, survey and secondary research sources.
  • Utilize data triangulation to produce strong and robust insights
  • Manage market research projects E2E: Briefing, Development, Execution, Sharing
  • Work closely with Business Strategists and Product Managers to ensure Market and Product insights are fused throughout the business and product development process
  • Strategize how to tackle questions that matter most by always being on top of market trends, intelligence, and research industry methodologies innovation

• Holding a Master's Degree or Ph.D. in Economics/Sociology or other relevant fields
  • 4-8 years experience or more in the field of Market Research
  • Strong execution and management experience with survey or polling methodologies
  • Experience and knowledge in quantitative research including one of the following: customer segmentation, funnel analysis, consumer behavior, usage and attitude studies, pricing studies
  • Hands-on with a proven track record of designing, executing, analyzing and sharing survey research
  • Has experience and extensive knowledge on the usage of external stats and data sources
  • Has expertise using Research panel suppliers both offline and online
  • Excellent knowledge of statistical packages (SPSS, R)
  • Must speak English and preferably have secondary language capability (Southeast Asia) and must be currently residing in Indonesia
